summary: The video demonstrates how to create a specific video effect by filming two clips, one with a hand gesture and the other in time-lapse mode. These clips are then edited in Capcut, where the first clip is trimmed and the second clip's speed is adjusted using a custom curve. A video effect called 'Quantum Shake' is applied between the two clips.
transcript: How to do this? How to do this? Film your first video making your hand movement. Video 1. Just like that. Switch to Time-Lapse Mode. Walk slowly forward. Record a video and walk slowly forward. Then open both clips in Capcut. Trim the first clip so it ends after the movement. Then select the second clip. Go to Speed. Curve. Custom. Drag a curve like this. Go to Effects. Video Effects and choose Quantum Shake. Edit between both clips. That's it. If you want to learn more. Comment MASTERCLASS to learn more.
